title: Catching Up with Karamo Brown
description:
Staying home was a change for everyone — but it was an especially big shift for Karamo Brown. He’s been on the go ever since Queer Eye became an overnight sensation two years ago… and now that he’s had some downtime, he wants to share what he’s learned and what’s making him smile.

Follow Karamo Brown on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook 

Check out his podcast “Karamo”

Follow Queer Eye on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
